reviews.review_msg: Phil 105 with him is tough. Miss lecture and you're screwed. He writes his own book for the first half of the term which is free and the book you're supposed to buy is useless since everything you need is in lecture and tutorial. Concepts are hard to grasp and his in-class quizzes are tough. He tests you on that one thing he mentioned for one slide
As long as you pay attention in his class & understand it, it should be fairly easy.
